fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 118.40 points or 0.6% to settle at 19,659.90. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 0.52% to 10.51. HDFC Bank, Axis Bank and Tech Mahindra were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
